<span style="font-family: Courier New; font-size: 1.25em">Remember, <span style="color:#ca1b1b;">your aim is to maintain the number of animals and overall agricultural yield of your choice</span>. You have 20 years (turns) to do this in; but <span style="color:#ca1b1b;">**if the population of animals goes extinct it's game over**</span>! Remember to keep an eye on the population and yield trends, and bear in mind that more farmers mean more actions taken!</span>
